p: Sensory evaluation (aroma and visual quality) was performed on each sampling day, as described above ( Section 2.2). Briefly, aroma was evaluated with a 5-point hedonic scale (0.5 interval) where 5 = not acceptable; 3 = not lettuce but acceptable; 1 = lettuce. Visual quality was evaluated with a 5-point hedonic scale (0.5 interval) where 5 = severe browning; 3 = light discoloration; 1 = green.
